title: (x) "Syperfly Lullabies" unicase geometric sans - Kravitz Thermal {Rainer}
content:
Hey, forgive me if I’m posting in the wrong forum... I’m new.

I’m trying to identify the font in my picture. If you need to see a larger version, check out [http://superflylullabies.etsy.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421174709/http:/superflylullabies.etsy.com/ "http://superflylullabies.etsy.com")

I have already asked my designer, but I’m in a bit of a hurry, so thought I’d try this out... any suggestions would be HUGELY appreciated!

Cheers,  
Julie

 [‹ Looking for scripts similar to "Fantasy - Britney Spears" logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421174709/http:/typophile.com/node/44424 "Go to previous forum topic") [AEROLINEAS ARGENTINAS FONTS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421174709/http:/typophile.com/node/44372 "Go to next forum topic")
author: superflylullabies

comments.content: Doi. Okay, I posted in the wrong forum. I’ll try and correct that now...

THANKYOUTHANKYOUTHANKYOU!!

...now how do I use it in word?

...nevermind, apparantly I’m cleverer than expected.

Thank you so much Renko
The space behind the L seems too large; I don’t know if MS WORD can do the kerning.
